name: CROPSMARE!
description:
A short puzzle game made for GBJAM10 (Theme: plant/plants)

RULES:

Fill every pot with plants to complete a level.

IMPORTANT:

If you don't enable cookies for this page your progress won't be saved.

CONTROLS: ACTIONSCONTROLSMOVEWASD / ARROW KEYS
PLANT SEED / DROP FLYXCANCEL SELECTIONCRESTART LEVELHOLD X + CPAUSEENTER / RETURN SKIP LEVEL(*)SPACE

(*): available after a while

CREDITS:

Made with Godot Engine, REAPER, Aseprite
SandyForest font by JayWright
Rockboxcond12 font by frizznickrz
